Description: $[Gg]ant -> ギャント, Gant Pole -> ギャント・ポール$She had a reason for coming to Scrimshander. And she has a reason for travelling to the Gant Pole. She's almost sure of it.
ChangeDescriptionText: $[Gg]ant -> ギャント, Gant Pole -> ギャント・ポール$1|The Lost Pilgrim settles into her bunk with vague contentment as she sails for the Gant Pole
Name: Scrimshander: A Lost Pilgrim
